scripts.deploy: npm run build:contract && cd contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/zkloans.wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:unit: pwsh -Command "$env:PATH = 'C:\Users\onech\.rustup\toolchains\stable-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc\bin;' + $env:PATH; cd contract && cargo test --features near-sdk/unit-testing"
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:contract && cd integration-tests && npm test  -- -- "./contract/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/zkloans.wasm"
scripts.deps-install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../integration-tests && npm install && cd ..
